title: Rogue Waters
description:
Set sail as Captain Cutter, a pirate caught in a deadly struggle for power and vengeance . Navigate dangerous waters, unleash mythical sea creatures , and outwit enemies as you chase legendary treasure and confront dark secrets.
Recruit and grow your pirate crew, discovering their hidden potential as you lead them into battle. Itâ€™s your responsibility to mold them into the legendary pirates they were destined to be.
EVER-CHANGING LAND AND SEA Face new challenges as the game world shifts procedurally with each run, offering fresh secrets, combat scenarios, and treasures to discover.
TURN THE TIDES Customize your naval encounters with cannons and ship artillery. Unleash powerful shots during naval combat to destroy enemy ship modules and gain the upper hand in boarding fights.

system_requirements.Processor: 4-Core  (4 CPUs) 2.5 Ghz 64bit Intel Core i5-4690T 2.5 GHz
